definition: ox tongue pastry, oval Guangdong pastry made of fried dough, resembling an ox tongue

sentences.english: It is accessible from Yi Nam Road and Ap Lei Chau Bridge Road to Precious Blood Primary School (South Horizons).
sentences.chinese: 可由怡南道及鸭脷洲桥道前往海怡宝血小学。

sentences.english: This route is operated by Ap Lei Chau Public Light Bus Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 本线由鸭脷洲专线小巴有限公司经营。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the chemical constituents of volatile oil from Sauropus ro strata Miq.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析龙脷叶的挥发油成分。

sentences.english: Wash and parboilduck tongues in boiling water for 5 minutes. Rinse and drainwell.
sentences.chinese: 鸭脷洗净，放入滚水中煮5分钟，取出洗净。

sentences.english: It is accessible from Main Street, Ap Lei Chau and Wah Ting Street.
sentences.chinese: 可由鸭脷洲大街及华庭街前往。

sentences.english: Wash and parboil duck tongues in boiling water for 5 minutes. Rinse and drain well.
sentences.chinese: 鸭脷洗净，放入滚水中煮5分钟，取出洗净。

definition: meat on the back of an animal
dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
